commands.tacz-fabric.reload.success: §a§l[TACZ]§r All pack is reload, time: %.3f ms
commands.tacz-fabric.reload.overwrite_on: §a§l●§r Now that the overwrite config is turned on, §6any changes in the tacz default gun pack will be §lreset!
commands.tacz-fabric.reload.overwrite_of: §a§l●§r Now that the overwrite config is turned off, §6You are §lfree to modify§6 the tacz default gun pack!
commands.tacz-fabric.reload.overwrite_co: §a§l●§r You can use command §c§n/tacz overwrite false§r to disable overwrite feature.
§a§l●§r You can use command §c§n/tacz overwrite true§r to enable overwrite feature.
message.tacz-fabric.fire_select.fail: Unknown fire mode, unable to shoot
gui.tacz-fabric.gun_refit.unload.no_spac: There is no free space in inventory for you to unload attachment.
gui.tacz-fabric.cloth_config_warning.tip: You'll need to install the Cloth Config API mod to use the ingame configuration feature
gui.tacz-fabric.client_gun_pack_download: Please check the internet connection, or exit the game and re-enter the game
tooltip.tacz-fabric.attachment.yaw.shift: Press [Shift] to see the support guns
jei.tacz-fabric.attachment_query.title: Attachment Query
config.tacz-fabric.client.key.hold_to_ai: True if you want to hold the right mouse button to aim
config.tacz-fabric.client.render.gun_lod: How far to display the lod model, 0 means always display
config.tacz-fabric.client.render.bullet_: The existence time of bullet hole particles, in tick
config.tacz-fabric.client.render.damage_: Damage counter reset time of target minecart, in millisecond
config.tacz-fabric.client.render.bullet_: The threshold for fading out when rendering bullet hole particles
config.tacz-fabric.client.render.hit_mar: The starting position of the hit marker when kill
config.tacz-fabric.client.render.head_sh: Whether or not to display the head shot's hitbox
config.tacz-fabric.client.render.gun_hud: Whether or not to display the gun's HUD
config.tacz-fabric.client.render.kill_am: Whether or not to display the kill amount
The duration of the kill amount, in second
config.tacz-fabric.client.render.crossha: The crosshair when holding a gun
config.tacz-fabric.client.render.target_: The farthest render distance of the target, including minecarts type
config.tacz-fabric.client.render.first_p: Whether or not to render first person bullet trail
config.tacz-fabric.client.render.disable: Disable the interact hud text in center of the screen
config.tacz-fabric.client.zoom.screen_di: Screen distance coefficient for zoom, using MDV standard, default is MDV133
config.tacz-fabric.client.zoom.zoom_sens: Zoom sensitivity is multiplied by this factor
config.tacz-fabric.common.gun.default_gu: The range (block) of other gun sound, reloading sound etc.
config.tacz-fabric.common.gun.creative_p: Whether or not the player will consume ammo in creative mode
config.tacz-fabric.common.gun.auto_reloa: Auto reload all the guns in player inventory, useful for pvp servers
config.tacz-fabric.common.ammo.explosive: Warning: Ammo with explosive properties can break blocks
Warning: Ammo with explosive properties can set the surroundings on fire
Ammo with explosive properties can add knockback effect
The distance at which the explosion effect can be seen
config.tacz-fabric.common.ammo.pass_thro: Those blocks that the ammo can pass through
config.tacz-fabric.common.ammo.destroy_g: Whether a ammo can break the glass
config.tacz-fabric.common.ammo.ignite_bl: Whether a ammo can ignite the block
config.tacz-fabric.common.ammo.ignite_en: Whether a ammo can ignite the entity
config.tacz-fabric.common.other.default_: When enabled, the reload command will not overwrite the default model file under config
config.tacz-fabric.common.other.target_s: The farthest sound distance of the target, including minecarts type
